import React from "react"; import './Homepage.css'; import { Button } from "@material-ui/core"; import {Link} from "react-router-dom"; function Homepage() { return(

Juego



Juego's Goal

Juego is an online platform that allows user to easily and safely find new people to game with on the most popular games. The platforms intuitive UI allows users to quickly and easily filter out other users based on metrics like skill, game preference, and gaming platform.





Security is Our Focus

Traditional platforms like Xbox live and the PlayStation Network and their built in 'friend request' features present a risk to many users. In the past users have been targeted by mallicious actors using denial of service attacks (DOS) upon the acceptence of a friend request on these platforms Security flaws like this leads to an under utilizations of a platforms networking capabilities and has lead to a decline in the quality of the online gaming experience





Join the Juego Family

By putting a face to the gamertag, Juego hopes to mitigate this risk by implementing a number a features to ensure that the person swiping right on you is not going to make you lose your service





Sign Up for FREE today and Start having a real gaming experience!

) } export default Homepage;
